statements: DELETE FROM vulnerabilities WHERE id = 1 AND severity = 'Low';
DELETE FROM vulnerabilities WHERE patch_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 1 AND severity_level > 5
DELETE FROM patches WHERE patch_id = 10 AND vulnerability_id = 3
DELETE FROM patch WHERE vulnerability_id = 3 AND patch_version = '1.2.3';
DELETE FROM vulnerability_patches WHERE vulnerability_id = 10 AND patch_id = 3
DELETE FROM patches WHERE applied = FALSE AND patch_date < '2022-01-01';
